text: أَرْسِلْهُ مَعَنَا غَدًا يَرْتَعْ وَيَلْعَبْ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Send him with us tomorrow that he may eat well and play. And indeed, we will be his guardians.
translation.id.indonesian: Biarkanlah dia pergi bersama kami besok pagi, agar dia (dapat) bersenang-senang dan (dapat) bermain-main, dan sesungguhnya kami pasti menjaganya".
